title.narrative: MODEL ENTERPRISES FOR HOUSEHOLD CHARCOAL AND BIOMASS ENERGY

description.narrative:
Five bamboo bio-energy industry established; three technology demonstrated; four stove and mould production enterprise. Two biomass energy business cases; 5000 (5000W) and smallholders benefiting from enterprise.
During the first year of implementation, the programme identified potential clusters in the beneficiary countries to establish two bamboo charcoal briquetting enterprise. The machinery and equipment needed for production of 1-ton-shift pillow block briquettes was procured to start the NGO Community Professional Partnership(NCPP) model enterprise in Kenya and Uganda.
